item.name: awAffSignupForm
item.item: Your request has been registered. We'll review it in 2-3 business days and notify you about our decision via email. Thanks for your patience.

item.name: form_title
item.item: To take part in our affiliate marketing program, please read our Terms & Conditions and answer a couple of questions below.

item.name: referral_website
item.item: Enter referral website (or specify any primary traffic source)

item.name: signup_message
item.item: In this field specify any valuable information about your resource.

The info you specify will significantly shorten the review process. Briefly describe the specifics of your resource, the products you are planning to promote, total unique visitors, and any other info you think might be relevant.

item.name: tooltip
item.item: Click the question mark to read Affiliate terms & conditions

item.name: basic_url
item.item: Insert the link for a particular product

item.name: generated_link
item.item: Or just copy & paste this link anywhere you want!

item.name: accountDisabledMessage
item.item: Your account was disabled. Please contact the store administrator on the reason for blocking your account.

item.name: paymentDetailsMessage
item.item: The first step is complete! Now, please submit payment details so we could transfer payments to you.

item.name: form_title
item.item: For more information about affiliate program please go to Terms & Conditions page.

item.name: payment_info
item.item: Please specify personal payment info, which we could use for payout: PayPal email or any e-wallet payment details.

item.name: unique_coupon_prefix
item.item:
Provide any alphanumeric combination as a unique code prefix to be used in coupon codes. Once the code prefix is saved, it can't be changed.
Example: ABC10 - Unique ID; SHOES15OFF - coupon code template; Generated coupon: ABC10-SHOES15OFF

item.name: affiliate_group_info
item.item: Being a member of a {group_name} affiliate group gives you {commission_formatted} premium from each item purchase (in addition to the regular commission).

item.name: recommendations_description
item.item: To save your time and effort that you would spend searching for products suitable for promotion on your resource, we've gathered our top picks in one place. Check out the list of recommended products to find the ones that work best for you.

item.name: affiliate_group_info
item.item: Being a member of a {group_name} affiliate group gives you {commission_formatted} premium from each item purchase (in addition to the regular commission).

item.name: send_request
item.item: {remaining_balance} is left to reach the minimum balance for a payout. Check out the availability dates of your pending commissions to know when you'll be able to request money payout.
